description: Comprehensive fix for disconnected simulation systems - wire badge effects to all positions, apply scheme attribute bonuses, integrate coaching perks and facility XP bonuses into progression engine
goal: Make the simulation modifier systems actually work - currently 85% of badges, 80% of coaching perks, and 100% of facility XP bonuses are dead code that's calculated but never applied
requirements: Wire badge effects to all positions (not just QB) - add playTypes receive, block, rush
Call getSchemeAttributeBonuses() and calculateSchemeGameModifiers() in simulator
Apply defensive scheme effects to play outcomes
Add guaranteed money and dead cap to contracts
Implement age-based attribute decline curves by position
constraints: Must not break existing game simulation flow
Badge multipliers should be meaningful (0.5x-1.0x not 0.01x)
Maintain backwards compatibility with existing save data
